cond-ic-randomizer.name: Enable Conditional Icon Randomizer
cond-ic-randomizer.description: Enables the Conditional Icon Randomizer - An icon randomizer mode that only gets activated on specific conditions, configured below.

cond-randomizer-type.name: Icon Randomizer Type
cond-randomizer-type.description: The type of icon randomizer to use.

live-ic-randomizer.name: Enable Live Icon Randomizer
live-ic-randomizer.description: Enables the Live Icon Randomizer - An icon randomizer mode that randomizes icons each X amount of time, configured below.

random-delay.name: Randomize Delay
random-delay.description: Defines how long to wait in-between each icon randomization.

randomize-color1.name: Randomize Color 1
randomize-color1.description: Randomize the first color of the icon.

randomize-color2.name: Randomize Color 2
randomize-color2.description: Randomize the second color of the icon.

randomize-glowcolor.name: Randomize Glow Color
randomize-glowcolor.description: Randomize the glow color of the icon.

rgbicons-title.name: RGB Icons
rgbicons-title.description: The chroma icons mod crashes whenever a fly passes by and megahack doesn't customize anything past the colors.

rgb-speed.name: RGB Cycle Speed
rgb-speed.description: How fast you want the RGB to cycle.

rgb-saturation.name: Saturation - Color 1
rgb-saturation.description: Saturation setting for Color 1's RGB mode.

rgb-saturation2.name: Saturation - Color 2
rgb-saturation2.description: Saturation setting for Color 2's RGB mode.

ignore-p2.name: Ignore Player 2
ignore-p2.description: Disables the RGB effect for Player 2.

trail-title.name: Legacy Trail
trail-title.description: The trail if it was still good.

max-points.name: Trail: Max Points
max-points.description:
The maximum amount of points the trail can have. 
This feature is taken from Eclipse.

pulse-title.name: Legacy Pulse
pulse-title.description: The pulse if it was still good.

legacy-pulse.name: Enable Legacy Pulse
legacy-pulse.description:
Enable the legacy pulse. 
This feature is taken from Eclipse.

pulse-fps.name: Pulse: FPS
pulse-fps.description: The FPS the legacy pulse should emulate.

garage-select-anim.name: Garage: Icon Select Animation
garage-select-anim.description: Enables a small scaling animation + a sound when selecting icons in the Icon Kit.

ballrot-bug.name: Gameplay: Ball Rotation Bug
ballrot-bug.description:
Replicates the Ball Rotation Bug from older GD versions. 
This feature is taken from QOLMod.

noclip-totem.name: Totem of Undying animation
noclip-totem.description: Settings for the Totem animation when dying with noclip on.

enable-totem.name: Enable Totem Animation
enable-totem.description: Enable the totem animation when dying with noclip on.

totem-cooldown.name: Totem Cooldown
totem-cooldown.description: The cooldown for how often can the totem animation be played. Higher cooldown means less totem animations, even if you're constantly dying.

totem-scale.name: Totem Scale
totem-scale.description: The scale of the totem animation on screen. Higher scale means bigger totem. Around 2.7 mimics the size of the Vanilla animation.

icon-stuff-title.name: Full Icon Customization
icon-stuff-title.description: Full customization of player icon colors.

enable-customcolors.name: Enable Custom Colors
enable-customcolors.description: Enable custom colors for the icon.

tint-trail.name: Tint Trail
tint-trail.description: Defines if the trail will be tinted or nah. Easier to make this an option LOLLLL

tint-ghost-trail.name: Tint Ghost Trail
tint-ghost-trail.description: Defines if the ghost trail will be tinted a different color from the primary color.

tint-dashfire.name: Tint Dash Fire
tint-dashfire.description: Defines if the dash fire will be tinted a different color from the primary color.

override-all-variances.name: Override All Variances
override-all-variances.description: Overrides all particle variances with the ones defined below. This will only apply to RGB variances, alpha variances will remain the same.

variances-override.name: Override Variances Color
variances-override.description: The value to use for all variances when 'Override All Variances' is enabled. This setting is an RGB color, the higher each channel is, the more variance there will be for that channel.

tint-mainparticles.name: Tint Main Particles
tint-mainparticles.description: Defines if the main particles will be tinted a different color from the icon's primary color.

p1-main-particles-start.name: Main Particles StartColor - P1
p1-main-particles-start.description: The start color of the main particles.

p1-main-particles-end.name: Main Particles EndColor - P1
p1-main-particles-end.description: The end color of the main particles.

p2-main-particles-start.name: Main Particles StartColor - P2
p2-main-particles-start.description: The start color of the main particles.

p2-main-particles-end.name: Main Particles EndColor - P2
p2-main-particles-end.description: The end color of the main particles.

tint-ufo-click-particles.name: Tint UFO Click Particles
tint-ufo-click-particles.description: Defines if the UFO click particles will be tinted a different color.

p1-ufo-click-particles-start.name: UFO Click Particles StartColor - P1
p1-ufo-click-particles-start.description: The start color of the UFO click particles.

p1-ufo-click-particles-end.name: UFO Click Particles EndColor - P1
p1-ufo-click-particles-end.description: The end color of the UFO click particles.

p2-ufo-click-particles-start.name: UFO Click Particles StartColor - P2
p2-ufo-click-particles-start.description: The start color of the UFO click particles.

p2-ufo-click-particles-end.name: UFO Click Particles EndColor - P2
p2-ufo-click-particles-end.description: The end color of the UFO click particles.

name: Personal Tweaks
description: Personal tweaks i need for the game
